ValidationRule.description: Prevent the HDW Sent and Interview Scheduled fields from being simultaneously checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( HDW_Sent__c = TRUE ), ( Interview_Scheduled__c = TRUE), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot have 'HDW Sent' and 'Interview Scheduled' checked at the same time.
